newsitem.title: USA: St. Jude sees 1996 revenues near $825 mln.
newsitem.headline: St. Jude sees 1996 revenues near $825 mln.

text.p: St. Jude Medical Inc chief executive Ronald Matricaria said the medical device company expects revenues this year to approach $825 million.
"It will be on the light side of $825 million," he said in an interview with Reuters on Wednesday evening.
He also said he is comfortable with the First Call consensus earnings forecast of $1.86 per share for 1996, and a range of $0.47 to $0.53 per share for the fourth quarter.
The St. Paul, Minn.-based company had revenues of $723.5 million and earnings of $1.82 per share in 1995.
